bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of food being thrown up again from the stomach. This may be in the evening after having eaten in the morning, or in the morning after having eaten in the evening, and also vomiting immediately after having eaten. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 18: 食不得 入，是有火也，食入反出，是無火也 , “An inability to consume food shows a presence of fire; a regurgitation of food shows an absence of fire”.
